markdownRemark.html:
According to the email confirmed by JMMP, our paper entitled, "Knot-TPP: A Unified Deep Learning Model for Process Incidence and Tool Wear Monitoring in Stacked Drilling", gets accepted.

In drilling Carbon-Fibre-Reinforced Polymers (CFRP)/Al stacks, adaptive drilling facilitates the optimisation of cutting parameters for each constituent stack layer and tool wear, thus enhancing cutting efficiency and borehole quality. This study proposed a knot–Temporal Pyramid Pooling (TPP) model aimed at monitoring both process incidences and tool wear in the drilling of hybrid stacks, which subsequently informs the machine tool to adjust cutting parameters or, if necessary, replaces the tool. TPP is introduced to remove the restriction of input dimensions, allowing for the acceptance of inputs with arbitrary shapes. On the other hand, a knot structure has been proposed to incorporate the classification of process incidences into the tool wear analysis, thereby enhancing prediction accuracy. The proposed model achieves a process incidence identification accuracy of 99.19% and a Mean Absolute Error (MAE) of 10 μm in tool wear prediction, demonstrating robust performance across a wide range of sampling conditions. This achievement facilitates decision-making and optimisation relating to cutting parameters and tool replacement in the context of adaptive drilling of aerospace materials.

We will make an special page to introduce the principles of our paper. Please keep updated for the project page

Link

Please view our paper in the link:

https://doi.org/10.3390/jmmp9050160

frontmatter.title: Our paper gets accepted by Journal of Manufacturing and Materials Processing

{{size}}）","recentQueueLength":"最近队列长度","recentlyProcessed":"最近处理（动画）：","processed":"已处理","dropped":"已丢弃","workers":"工作者数","avgLatency":"平均延迟","prioritisation":{"title":"动态任务优先级","desc":"自适应的优先级机制，可根据实时系统状态和需求动态调整任务优先级。"},"expDemoHeading":"客户端的指数退避 — 交互式演示","expDemoHow":"工作原理","expDemoPara":"该交互式演示运行一个连续的发送器来测量模拟的网络往返时间 (RTT)，并实时调整发送间隔。\n通过“网络成功率”滑块控制请求成功的概率；当请求失败时，发送器立即将发送间隔翻倍（指数退避）。当请求成功时，演示使用观察到的 RTT 来调整间隔：如果观察到的 RTT 大于当前发送间隔的两倍，则间隔翻倍；如果 RTT 小于当前发送间隔的一半，则间隔减半。为避免同步重试，调整中加入小的随机抖动。","expDemoParams":"参数：baseDelay = 100ms，适应规则（失败 → ×2；成功 → 若 RTT > 2×间隔 则 ×2，若 RTT < 间隔/2 则 ÷2），抖动不超过间隔的 10%，上限 = 20000ms。","expDemoTitle":"指数退避演示","expDemoDesc":"此演示展示了重试间隔如何动态调整：每次失败将延迟翻倍（到达上限）并加入少量抖动。使用“网络成功率”滑块调整每次尝试的模拟成功概率。","expDemoStart":"开始","expDemoCancel":"取消","expDemoReset":"重置","expDemoCurrentInterval":"当前发送间隔：","expDemoNetworkSuccess":"网络成功率：{{pct}}%","expDemoNetworkRtt":"模拟网络 RTT（ms）","time":"时间"},"bitDepthTitle":"位深示例","bitDepthDesc":"交互式位深量化演示，展示降低每通道位深对信号质量的影响。使用滑块调整每通道位数和噪声水平。","bitDepthLabel":"位深","noiseLevelLabel":"噪声级别","legendLight":"蓝色 = 原始，橙色 = 量化","legendDark":"橙色 = 原始，蓝色 = 量化","estimatedBits":"估计位数","estimatedReduction":"估计压缩减少","snrLabel":"信噪比 (SNR)","sqnrLabel":"量化信噪比 (SQNR)","yes":"是","no":"否","dataCompressionHeading":"数据压缩","dataCompressionNotePrefix":"参考","dataCompressionNoteLinkText":"最小充分单元理论","dataCompressionNoteSuffix":"了解关于数据形状方面的压缩。","conclusionsHeading":"结论","conclusionsList":["我们提出了一种用于实时刀具状态监测的新型云计算框架 EBPC，融合了基于指数退避的流量控制、数据最小化、生产者-消费者任务调度和动态任务优先级机制。","该框架有效应对了网络拥塞、数据过载和资源竞争等挑战，确保刀具状态监测系统的高效与可靠。","实验结果表明 EBPC 在延迟、吞吐量和资源利用方面优于传统架构，是制造环境下实时刀具状态监测的有前景的解决方案。"],"statementForReviwerTitle":"对不专业同行评议的声明","statementForReviwerPara":"我想感谢每一位审稿人花时间和精力审阅论文。然而，令人非常遗憾的是，其中一位审稿人拒绝的建议是基于一些并非来自我们手稿的观点。对此不专业的意见我深表遗憾。","exceptPeople":"以下人员除外","dataCompressionHow":"工作原理","dataCompressionPara":"该交互式演示允许您探索位深度下降对信号质量的影响。滑块可将每通道位深从 1 调整到 8，帮助您观察降低位深如何影响信号表现。这对于理解通过减少每个特征表示所用的位数来实现数据压缩非常有帮助。","dataCompressionNoteStrong":"注意：降低位深可能导致精度损失并引入视觉伪影，尤其是在非常低的位深下。当量化噪声超出原始信号中要素的信噪比 (SNR) 时，可能会导致要素被干扰，进而降低感知质量。","producerHeading":"生产者/消费者
